name: White Chocolate-Coconut Cookies
author: jowolf2
summary: Lime and coconut combine with white chocolate for a unique cookie experience.
ingredients: 2 cups finely shredded coconut, divided, or more to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Combine butter, sugars, and egg in a bowl using a wooden spoon, not an electric mixer
Grate lime zest into the mixture
Stir in 1/2 to 3/4 teaspoon lime juice
Combine flour, white chocolate chips, baking soda, and salt in a separate bowl
Mix in butter mixture until a stiff dough forms
Place remaining coconut on a flat dish
Roll dough into ping pong ball-sized balls; roll in coconut
Arrange dough on the prepared cookie sheets; do not press down
Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned around the edges, about 10 minutes
